data.title: What Nobel Prize did Hermann Hesse win and when was it awarded?
data.meta_description:
Paul Johann Ludwig Heyse won The Nobel Prize in Literature in
1910.
data.text:
Paul Johann Ludwig Heyse won The Nobel Prize in Literature in 1910.

Why did Alfred Hermann Fried win The Nobel Peace Prize in 1911?

The Nobel Peace Prize 1911 was awarded jointly to Tobias Michael Carel Asser and Alfred Hermann Fried

Why did Leon Victor Auguste Bourgeois win The Nobel Peace Prize in 1920?

The Nobel Peace Prize 1907 was awarded jointly to Ernesto Teodoro Moneta and Louis Renault

Why did Carlos Saavedra Lamas win The Nobel Peace Prize in 1936?

The Nobel Peace Prize 1936 was awarded to Carlos Saavedra Lamas.

What Nobel Prize did Hermann Staudinger win and when was it awarded?

Hermann Staudinger won The Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1953.

What Nobel Prize did Hermann Emil Fischer win and when was it awarded?

Hermann Emil Fischer won The Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1902.

What Nobel Prize did Walther Hermann Nernst win and when was it awarded?

Walther Hermann Nernst won The Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1920.

What Nobel Prize did Hermann Joseph Muller win and when was it awarded?

Hermann Joseph Muller won The Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 1946.
